]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**

function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const rec = api.data.my_next_needit.results[0];
    return [{
            fieldLabel: 'Number',
            displayValue: rec.number.displayValue,
            type: 'reference',
            sysId: rec.sys_id.value,
            table: 'x_58872_needit_needit'
        },
        {

            displayValue: rec.u_when_needed.displayValue,
            type: 'simple'
        },
        {

            displayValue: rec.u_request_type.displayValue,
            type: 'simple'
        }
    ];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-24 14:33:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>6e9b70bf93777110acd5bc2efaba102a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>my_next_needit_record/secondaryItems</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6e9b70bf93777110acd5bc2efaba102a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 14:33:32</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
